metadata.title: CVE-2018-17434 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A SIGFPE signal is raised in the function apply_filters() ofh5repack_filters.c in the HDF HDF5 through 1.10.3 library during anattempted parse of a crafted HDF file, because of incorrect protectionagainst division by zero. It could allow a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
